    Connection Issues?
    If you're experiencing connection problems:
    • Check that your internet connection is stable
    • Ensure WebSocket connections are not blocked by your firewall
    • Try disabling any VPN or proxy services
    • Allow camera and microphone permissions when prompted
    • If issues persist, the server may be temporarily unavailable - please try again later

    Choose Storage Facility

    Select where the school management system data should be saved. Different storage options provide different benefits.

    Warning: Changing storage facility may require data migration. Please backup your data before switching.
    Browser LocalStorage

    Data stored locally in the browser. Fast and works offline. Limited to ~5MB.

    Active
    IndexedDB (Enhanced Local)

    Advanced browser storage with larger capacity. Supports complex queries. Works offline.

    Available
    Firebase Cloud Storage

    Cloud-based storage with real-time sync across devices. Requires internet connection.

    Setup Required
    MongoDB Atlas

    Enterprise-grade cloud database with advanced querying and scalability options.

    Setup Required
    Custom API Endpoint

    Connect to your own backend server or custom storage solution via REST API.

    G19 Systems Cloud Sync

    When the g19systems administrator logs in, the system automatically connects to the G19 Systems Cloud. All devices accessing g19systems.com will be connected to this cloud instance for seamless real-time synchronization across all devices.

    Real-Time Synchronization

    Configure Firebase to enable real-time message syncing across all devices, video/voice calls, and cloud storage for voice notes. Without Firebase, the system uses local BroadcastChannel API (same device only).

    Status

    Not Configured

    Local sync only
    Sync Type

    BroadcastChannel

    Same device only
    Calling

    Ready

    WebRTC P2P
    Firebase Configuration

    Enter your Firebase project credentials to enable cross-device real-time synchronization.

    From Firebase Console Project Settings
    Unique identifier for your school
    How to get Firebase credentials:
    1. Go to Firebase Console
    2. Create a new project or select existing project
    3. Click on Project Settings (gear icon)
    4. Scroll down to "Your apps" section
    5. Click on Web app () to add or view your web app
    6. Copy the configuration values and paste them above
    7. Enable Realtime Database, Storage, and Cloud Messaging in Firebase Console
    Features Enabled with Firebase
    • Cross-Device Sync: Messages and data sync instantly across all devices (phones, tablets, computers)
    • Real-Time Updates: Admin changes reflect immediately on all connected devices
    • Push Notifications: Receive notifications even when app is closed
    • Cloud Storage: Voice notes stored securely in cloud
    • Offline Support: Data syncs automatically when connection restored
    • Call Signaling: Enhanced video/voice call coordination across devices

    Additional Information
    Bulk Import Students (CSV/Excel/PDF/Word)
    SA-Sams Format Requirements: Your file should contain the following columns:
    Required: Surname, FirstName, Grade, Accession Number
    Optional: IDNumber, DateOfBirth, Gender, HomeLanguage, ParentName, ParentContact, Address
    Example: Accession,Surname,FirstName,Grade,IDNumber,DateOfBirth,Gender,HomeLanguage
